content: My name is Max Müller from Germany.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with Peter Schmidt, the landlord of the apartment in Duisburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price for the apartment in Duisburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: We did not agree on a final price because I, as a potential tenant, was looking for a lower price, and the landlord, Peter Schmidt, was not willing to negotiate the price or offer any discounts.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1-10, how satisfied are you with the outcome? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I am 0 out of 10 satisfied with the outcome because the negotiation ended without reaching an agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt
